original_title: Sri Lanka electronic procurement system online at promise.lk
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka has started an e-government procurement portal at www.promise.lk in a bid to make streamline activities and make them more transparent.

E-government procurement is the collaborative use of information and communications technologies by government agencies, bidding community, regulatory and oversight agencies, other supporting service providers, and civil society in procurement according to the website.
It makes ensure transparency and accountability and value for money in public procurement of goods, works and services, and management of contracts.
A series of ministries and agencies are already on the system.
Sri Lanka is in the process of strengthening public financial management.
